information: PPS – your specialist for plastic card printing, encoding and personalisation of RFID cards, chip cards, gift cards, voucher cards, membership cards, customer cards and lettershop services. With over 30 years of experience, we are happy to advise you in your card project, whether it be finishing, further processing such as application on carriers, shipping individually printed plastic cards directly to customers as a mailing, software solutions for access systems and plastic card accessories – with PPS you will receive all services from a single source. Founded in 1986, PPS GmbH is now a second-generation family-owned business and stands for highest quality and absolute customer focus. We adhere strictly to the German Federal Data Protection Act.
products: Standard cards | Barcode cards | Magnetic stripe cards | Chip cards | RFID cards | Hybrid cards | High temperature cards | individual special solutions around Plastic cards | Printed Plastic cards in special format | Thin plastic cards
